WRITING.TEXT: You're correct it is with pen and ink! The medium it's on is just a plain old yellow sticky note. Hence the name sticky Monsters
I was just using the original as my wallpaper but this is a step up!

WRITING.TEXT: As a college student I don't really have the money for this, and I'm scared to tell my parents so I can't really ask them for help. Is it really that bad?

WRITING.TITLE: I'm a college student and I just got arrested for weed.

WRITING.TEXT: Never thought a copypasta would inspire me
I will pray for you friend. Stay strong.

WRITING.TITLE: I just got appointed as Chaplain for my fraternity!
WRITING.TEXT: What can I do to make the most of my position, and give my brothers the best experience possible?

This couldn't be any more relevant. I dated a girl for a year and a half and I was so in love with her but we broke up last week because of the exact same reason as you. I'm incredibly heart broken but through the support of God and my friends I know I'll get through this and come out a better and stronger person. Praying for you friend stay strong.
You're not in this alone I went through the same thing. Praying for you brother.
Thank you for your words. I think this will help me out a lot!
It makes me happy to know that you were able to find a way to get somewhat closer to God. I guess I just need to find my own. Thank you so much.

Thank you for your words. As for going to events on campus I've gone to 4 since I moved in. I try my best to be apart of the conversations and everything but I feel so far behind everyone and I never know what to say. This weekend I'm going to try and find a Church off campus and see if that helps me.
